name: UserExperienceDesignMethods
0:
”Alexa open Method Cards”
”Alexa ask Method Cards for next Design Method”
”Alexa ask Method Cards for new Design Method”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: method cards
des:
Ask for Design Methods and learn about various User Experience Design Methods

To start, just say "Alexa, open method cards" or "Alexa, open method cards for a new design method" 

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
